titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I wrote letters, & then went to the Cathedral & performed the marriage ceremony between Caroline Lucy Mumby and Edward Hopper Anderson

. The departure of an agreeable & trustworthy house–maid after seven years service is an event. Marion & I walked round the wood after lunch, but found the roads dangerously slippery with the ice. I attended Evensong in the Cathedral, & wrote more letters.
